title: 2 penta kills in 1 game of aram
body: In this match I got 2 pentakills. The match history is [here](http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/104948227/201635710). I got 2 penta kills using  {{champion:80}} Pantheon, also I have never ever played pantheon. Also in this aram game this is the first time I have got a pentakill EVER and I was suprised when I got 2 pentakills.

replies.body:
those stats literally gave me aids. nobody with half a brain is gonna give half a brain about your penta kills. look at this shit dude..... can someone please confirm that my computer and internet and screen and life is broken, because, i seem to be, hehe, seeing some.....pretty strange things. im uh hehe, this is hehe, pretty damn weird lyk.....oh em gee heheheheheHEHEHEHEHEHE....but srs wtf am i reading....WTF AM I READING....

things that my brain seems to be misinterpreting as actually existing on my screen

people have bought boots on aram
5 people have 2 boots
5 people have 2 boots on aram
14 boots were bought in a single game
14 boots were bought in a single game of aram
everyone who bought more than 1 boot undeniably fed
literally all but 3 people undeniably fed
literally all but 3 people undeniably fed in an aram, in a single lane, with no other places to go
literally all but 3 people have mark and ghost (mmkay this cant be a coincidence, wot is dis....)
the only person with no boots got....62 kills.....
1 person in the game got 38% of all kills in the game
1 person in the game got 38% of all kills in a game of aram
8 out of 14 (thats, 14 boots in the single game) were swiftness boots
swiftness boots being bought on aram
besides the support everyone who bought swiftness boots fed
kalista not using her spear, in the entire 30 minutes and 31 seconds of the game
1 person on each side did over half of their entire teams damage
1 person on each side did over half of their entire teams damage on an aram, in a single lane, with no other places to go
161 kills in 30 minutes and 31 seconds, which is 1 kill......every.....11....seconds...........................
10 people. 1 dies every 11 seconds. 100% to 0. every 11 seconds throughout the entire game
161 kills and only 235 assists
161 kills and only 235 assists in an aram

the aids i got has given me cancer

na but srs you must have played in the middle of a 7-lan trolling. i dont know what they were doing, maybe they tried to get past and get executed without dying to anyone? explains the mark and ghost spells. shouldve reported all these %%%%s, having to drag you 3 poor lads down with them. 

this isnt an official penta btw, this is like a pentakill on bots, srs
Dude you can't get bots on ARAM. And yes I might report these people.
Are you sure you can't? I'm at least 90% sure I've seen people bot ARAMs?
You can't get riot bots but you can get Summoner bots please report these Summoners.

You can get Player bots.

and a lot of Summoners are using player bots for a couple months Please report these Summoners as it is considered cheating.

i wrote all that and you came away with "hurrdurr *irrelevant comment supporting my initial opinion on an achievement you so obviously discredited but im trying to defend to keep my pride and dignity on the interwebz forum*" its not a penta, you're 15 if you think it is. anyone can get pentas against feeders....
Single boots are pretty good on slow champs that like mpen (Anivia with mpen boots is pretty good.)
or wait til 20 minutes and you can have 6 complete ap items including a void staff and liandrys against tanks
Yeah cus obviously the other 19 minutes and 59 seconds won't require you to have MS against a melee champ or assassin.

if you're squishy you shouldnt be anywhere near where you can get caught, especially by marks. i remember you play xerath, if you have just 1 dedicated tank on your team and he does his job properly you should never be getting caught. if you do you still have your stun that you should be holding on to. as for squishy non disengage champs like kat or.....warwick, you should be waiting for your time to all in or do what damage you can and always keep your distance unless you have something important to do depending on the champ you picked. also as champs like xerath ziggs vayne, i always get exhaust and usually ignite but you could argue flash is better. exhaust is for when you usually have something like a lee sin flying around the whole place and hes right on top of you, you can exhaust and kite away. usually its only 1 champ that manages to get that far in anyway. i get ignite because if im useless like an early vayne, someone like a lee sin might Q towerdive and i manage to get 3 shots off before he W's away with a speck of health. cleanse can also be helpful, but the point is its really easy to play safe and not require additional ms in such a small environment

I don't bother with boots on champs that have range but Lissandra, Annie and Anivia (and Ryze if someone's dumb enough not to get a single tank item) are dangerously short ranged, I sell them when I get my sixth item though.
